column2: an A.M. Eatery////You shouldn't wait 40 minutes for eggs and pancakes to arrive and then for them to be cold! And then literally hunting down your waitress for a coffee refill. People come to restaurants because they want to be served
column3: otherwise you get it to go or cook yourself. 60 total minutes to order and receive two egg plates when you are 70% full on a weekday brunch time is beyond unacceptable
